name: Zaratan
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Earth-Shaking Movement: As a bonus action after moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan can send a shock wave through the ground in a 120-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute. Each creature on the ground that is concentrating must succeed on a DC 25+1d14 + 18 Constitution saving throw or the creature's concentration is broken.
traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If the zaratan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Magic Weapons: The zaratan's weapon attacks are magical.
traits.Siege Monster: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Earth-Shaking Movement).
